thread.title: Nice hotel for a short stay in Paris
thread.title_full: Nice hotel for a short stay in Paris - Review of Lodge In Mis, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mschie_545839
title: Nice hotel for a short stay in Paris
text: Very friendly receptionist who gave us good directions to town.The rooms and bathrooms look realy nice. The beds are very comfortable. Lot of choice at breakfast for french standards. The metro station is only 5 minutes from the hotel. Good value for money.
